General.Name: Cingulate Inc. Warrants
General.Description: Cingulate Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development of product candidates for the treatment of central nervous system and neurobiological disorders. The company's lead product candidates are CTx-1301 (dexmethylphenidate) and CTx-1302 (dextroamphetamine) for the treatment of attention deficit/hyperactivity disorders. It also focuses on developing CTx-2103 for the treatment of anxiety disorders. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Kansas City, Kansas with an additional location in Morristown, New Jersey.
General.Address: 1901 West 47th Place, Kansas City, KS, United States, 66205
